1.0.1.en: Fixed an issue with handling empty configuration

1.0.2.en: More fixes in empty config handling. Minor reliability improvements.

1.0.3.en: Added info to restart the app after gateway IP change

1.2.0.en: Added better handling for the ventilation mode

1.3.2.en: Fixed an issue with adding new device

1.4.0.en: Added option to controll boost and bypass. Added fan speed measurements. Added fan speed next scheduled change information. Added ability to react to fan duty and speed in flows.

1.4.1.en: Added option to controll boost and bypass mode. Added fan speed measurements. Added fan speed next scheduled change information. Added ability to react to fan duty and speed in flows.

1.4.3.en: Added option to controll boost and bypass mode from app and flows.

1.4.4.en: Added option to controll boost and bypass mode from app and flows. Added fan speed measurement capabilities. Added bypass mode information. Added fan speed next scheduled change countdown. Added ability to react to fan duty, fan speed and bypass state in flows.

1.4.5.en: Added flow condition that checks remaining days to replace filter

1.5.0.en: Better connection handling, added days to replace filter capability handling

1.5.1.en: Better connection handling, added days to replace filter capability handling
